Nuxt Dynamic Routes

Create dynamic routes for full static website in NuxtJS

If you have dynamic routes, or hidden routes not linked from your page you may need to create them during the generate process.


How to generate dynamic routes


In order to generate all the requested routes we have to populate the generate.routes property in nuxt.config.js


...
generate: {
    routes: dynamicRoutes,
    fallback: true
},

...


Then we can write out dynamicRoutes function and add to nuxt.config.js


...
import axios from 'axios'
let dynamicRoutes = () => {
  return new Promise(resolve => {
    axios.get( process.env.API_URL + 'articles' ).then( response => {
      const slugs = response.data.map ( el => {
        return {
          route: '/' + el.slug,
          payload: el
        }
      })
      resolve ( slugs )
    })
  })
}

export default {
...


The dynamicRoutes function uses axios to get all the articles from our CMS and returns:


  • route: article_slug
  • payload: article_payload


This will tell to NUXTJS which extra route has to generate.
